title: Red Receives a Mission from Her Mother
summary: Red’s mother tells her to deliver a basket of medicine and treats to her grandmother. Red protests, wanting to spend time with her secret admirer in the village, but her mother insists, revealing that Grandmother is ill and needs help. Red reluctantly agrees, setting out with a promise to return before sunset.

title: Red Encounters the Wolf on the Forest Path
summary: Red meets the Wolf, who charms her with compliments and flirty banter. The Wolf asks about her destination and, sensing her loneliness, offers to guide her through a shortcut. Red considers the offer, debating the risk, but accepts after the Wolf convinces her he only wants her company.

title: Wolf Races Ahead to Grandmother’s Cottage
summary: The Wolf, motivated by his romantic interest in Red and suspicion about her admirer, runs ahead to Grandmother’s cottage. He tricks Grandmother into letting him inside, then locks her in a closet. The Wolf disguises himself as Grandmother, preparing to intercept Red and confess his feelings.

title: Red Arrives and Uncovers the Wolf's Ruse
summary: Red enters the cottage, noticing odd clues about 'Grandmother’s' appearance and voice. She confronts the disguised Wolf, demanding the truth. The Wolf, caught off guard, admits his deception and reveals his growing affection for Red, begging forgiveness and offering to release Grandmother.

title: Grandmother Escapes and Confronts the Wolf
summary: Grandmother escapes the closet, armed with a broom, and interrupts Red and the Wolf’s tense conversation. She scolds the Wolf for his trickery, but Red intervenes, explaining the Wolf’s romantic intentions. Grandmother agrees to listen, but insists the Wolf must prove he is trustworthy.

title: Red Makes a Decision and Faces Her Admirer
summary: Red’s admirer, a young woodsman, arrives at the cottage, having tracked Red out of concern. He confronts the Wolf, challenging him for Red’s affection. Red stops them from fighting, declaring she will choose who truly cares for her. She questions both suitors, forcing them to reveal their motivations.

title: Red Chooses Her Path Forward
summary: Red weighs both suitors’ confessions and actions, ultimately deciding to give the Wolf a chance to prove himself through kindness and honesty. The woodsman accepts her decision, vowing to remain her friend. Red and the Wolf leave the cottage together, promising Grandmother they will visit often.
